name: Inertia Â· Design System
description:
Inertia is a powerful UI Web Design System template made in Figma. This template is made with the intention that you learn how a real prototype of a web page works.


Licence

Inertia Design System template is a totally free product. However it cannot be used for personal or commercial benefits, it can only be used to observe, learn and look at the details of how a real web page works. I want you to dive deep into the details for a better experience, check everything.


You are not allowed to profit from the template. The only benefit that can be extracted from this product is all the knowledge and learning that you are able to acquire by researching on a real project.


The icons

The icons have been used in this project so that you will be able to see how an icon system works in a real project. I don't have the commercial rights of the icons, so you CANNOT use the icons by extracting them directly from the template.

If you want to make personal/commercial use of the icons used in this template, I strongly recommend checking the link of the original license:


https://github.com/feathericons/feather/blob/master/LICENSE

https://github.com/Iconscout/unicons

https://github.com/feathericons/feather


What's more

Hello there! By the way, this is Jordi and I'm a graphic designer and for the previous 3 months, I've been working pretty hard on my upcoming Typographic eBook, which will be soon released on my Gumroad page and on my official webpage jordiespinosa.com/ebook.

Would you like to work?

If you like my content, you can reach me out by sending an email to info@jordiespinosa.com.


Extra

I hope you enjoy it, if you like the pack, I would appreciate it if you share it with your friends or your close circle so that they can get it too.


On the other hand, I would like you to rate the pack from 1 to 5 stars of your choice.


Thank you!
